com.pkrete.xrd4j.client.serializer

Class AbstractServiceRequestSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.serializer.AbstractHeaderSerializer
      • com.pkrete.xrd4j.client.serializer.AbstractServiceRequestSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceRequestSerializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultServiceRequestSerializer

    public abstract class AbstractServiceRequestSerializer
extends AbstractHeaderSerializer
implements ServiceRequestSerializer
    This abstract class serves as base class for serializer classes that serialize ServiceRequest objects to SOAPMessage objects. All the subclasses must implement the serializeRequest method which takes care of serializing application specific request object to SOAP body's request element. This class takes care of adding all the required SOAP headers.
    Author:
    Petteri Kivim√§ki

    • Method Detail

      • serializeRequest

        protected abstract void serializeRequest(ServiceRequest request,
                    SOAPElement soapRequest,
                    SOAPEnvelope envelope)
                                  throws SOAPException
        Serializes the application specific request part to SOAP body's request element. All the children under request element will use provider's namespace. Namespace prefix is added automatically.
        Parameters:
        request - ServiceRequest holding the application specific request object
        soapRequest - SOAPMessage's request object where the request element is added
        envelope - SOAPMessage's SOAPEnvelope object
        Throws:
        SOAPException - if there's a SOAP error

      • serialize

        public final SOAPMessage serialize(ServiceRequest request)
        Serializes the given ServiceRequest to SOAPMessage.
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface ServiceRequestSerializer
        Parameters:
        request - ServiceRequest to be serialized
        Returns:
        SOAPMessage representing the given ServiceRequest; null if the operation fails
